import React from 'react' import Slider from 'react-slick' import ava01 from '../../assets/images/ava-1.jpg' import ava02 from '../../assets/images/ava-2.jpg' import ava03 from '../../assets/images/ava-3.jpg' const Testimonials = () => { const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, autoplay: true, speed: 3000, // Smooth speed for continuous sliding swipeToSlide: true, autoplaySpeed: 0, // Immediate continuous movement cssEase: 'linear', // Ensures smooth transition slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1, pauseOnHover: false, // Prevents stopping on hover responsive: [ { breakpoint: 992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, }, }, { breakpoint: 576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, }, }, ], } return ( {[ava01, ava02, ava03, ava01, ava02, ava03].map((item, index) => (
